content: ♥ if you like gundam and crocheting you definitely need a haro in your life ♥ the pattern is written in english with us terminology ♥ it has 5 pages with all the instructions for each piece along with pictures ♥ crochet skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase decrease and sewing body parts ♥ crochet hook 2 5mm ♥ the final product is approx 6cm tall thanks for looking at my pattern ari from arigurumis ✿◠‿◠
